name: Dash Forest
description:
In this game you slide across a forest in the night. This game is a short puzzle game, where you have to think where you slide!

Controlls Slide Movement W, A, S, D and / or  arrow keys.  Friday Night Game Jam

This game was made for a game jam, where you have to make a game in 3 hours. The 3-hours contain the actual development, but not the planning. 

The theme of this jam was one of my asset packs.
https://pxldev.itch.io/1-bit-adventure-pack
